api_list.api_description: This endpoint allows you to search for a movie or tvshow based on various parameters such as release year , imdb rating , genre , language etc.

optional_parameters.name: start_year
optional_parameters.description: Enter any year between 1970 to 2020 to get results.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Enter type 'movie' or 'show'

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Enter values highestrated , lowestrated , latest , oldest to  sort results accodingly .

optional_parameters.name: genre
optional_parameters.description: use comma seperated values to enter multiple genre eg : action,horror

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: use comma seperated values to enter multiple values , eg : english,german

optional_parameters.name: end_year
optional_parameters.description: Enter any year from 1970 to 2020 to  get results.

api_list.api_description: Get info on a  cast such as name , profession , birth and death year , bio , poster , best titles  etc.

required_parameters.description: input 'genre' or 'language' to get array of genre or languages that can be used as filter in advanced search .

api_list.api_description: Get basic information on a movie or tv show such as imdbid , title , genre , runtime , imdbrating , language , synopsis , type , imageurl  , Streaming platforms info etc.

Get  information on OTT platforms we suuport .

Get the API's health
L'état courant (ie. le dernier état du colis).
Compte le nombre d'étapes de l'historique, pratique pour limiter la consommation réseau ou les ressources sur un IoT. Permet par exemple de poller un état de manière optimale.
Tout l'historique du colis depuis son envoi jusqu'au dernier état en cours.

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: t = Tiny, 90 x 68 pixels;  s= Small, 120 x 90 pixels;  m = Medium, 200 x 150 pixels; l = Large, 400 x 300 pixels;  x = Extra large, 480 x 360 pixels

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL to generate the thumbnail from

api_list.api_description: Issues a reset API call if refresh is set to 1. Else it will download if the image is ready (see endpoint 2.)

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: t = Tiny, 90 x 68 pixels;  s= Small, 120 x 90 pixels;  m = Medium, 200 x 150 pixels; l = Large, 400 x 300 pixels;  x = Extra large, 480 x 360 pixels

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL to generate the thumbnail from

optional_parameters.name: refresh
optional_parameters.description: This parameter forces the currently generate d thumbnail to be regenerated.  It is optional and will be ignored unless it contains the value 1

api_list.api_description: This endpoint allows you to search for a movie or tvshow based on various parameters such as release year , imdb rating , genre , language etc.

optional_parameters.name: start_year
optional_parameters.description: Enter any year between 1970 to 2020 to get results.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Enter type 'movie' or 'show'

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Enter values highestrated , lowestrated , latest , oldest to  sort results accodingly .

optional_parameters.name: genre
optional_parameters.description: use comma seperated values to enter multiple genre eg : action,horror

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: use comma seperated values to enter multiple values , eg : english,german

optional_parameters.name: end_year
optional_parameters.description: Enter any year from 1970 to 2020 to  get results.
